The fact that you are selling your tokens without even a white paper out yet reminds me of old times.Quote from: Msthcoin on January 27, 2023, 06:01:41 PMcompared to Blockchainbets or Rollbit its undervalued. When you compare your own lemonade stand to the coca-cola company, it's undervalued if you consider only that both are making lemonade so they must be equally valuable.hey hey sir, sorry for my late response, i more active on other channels. Well you got a point. It was not clever from me to compare the big players with a freshly launched project. I might have rushed as well with the statement that it will be a finished product. development never stops right? - so the terms of service and privacy will be updated (its already written) - consider the platform as "beta" with all elements working - also pragmatic play is available on the casino section. where you able to check the sportsbook and the crazy amount of sub bet options? You have to admit building a platform like this with 0 external funds is pretty impressive. regarding whitepaper - there is a pitch deck if you are really into reading sheets (jump into TG and ask for it) - but the concept is clear and simple (share 50% of house net income with staker) and you can read out the main vision on pepe.bet as well. So dont see that as a concerning point. until next time - cheers
